= Fitness =
<p>
The most common application of GAs is the optimization task. The goal is to find the correct values for a list of parameters in a function. The fitness function depends of problem to optimize and can goes from find a simple value like a distance to resolve complex functions where all the parameters are related and is not possible to maxime one of the with out to minimize others.
</p>
